name: Promotion Class: Swordsman
description:
Role: Melee Damage

Forgoing heavier armor for superior damage, this master of blades has perfected the art of swordplay.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +225
Damage +3%

Traits Granted:
Axe Mastery
Longsword Mastery
Mace Mastery
Short Sword Mastery
Buckler Mastery
Medium Shield Mastery

Enhancements:
Shield Slam: Now you are considered Blocking when charging.
Pursuit: Now has a reduced cooldown.
Chain Attack: Now also applies a Bleed.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Swordsman promotion class and prevents access to the Secutor and Sentinel promotion classes.
